What is the purpose of a hash function in a hash table?
abbreviation: To map keys to index locations for efficient lookup

description: What is the difference between synchronous and asynchronous programming?

abbreviation: A situation where two or more threads are waiting for each other to release resources

description: What is the Big O notation used for?
abbreviation: To describe the efficiency of an algorithm in terms of time and space complexity

description: What is a binary search tree (BST)?
abbreviation: A tree where each node has at most two children and left < root < right

description: Explain the difference between deep copy and shallow copy.
abbreviation: Deep Copy: Copies all nested objects; Shallow Copy: References the same objects
